entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
